problem_statement: Rewriting agreements based on input applications
user_journeys: Input application data, generate customized agreements, review and finalize documents
wow_factor: Efficient use of LLM for tailored document creation

problem_statement: HR teams often struggle with sifting through a large volume of applications, leading to missed qualified candidates and increased time-to-hire.
user_journeys: Upload resumes, filter using natural language queries, review shortlisted candidates, refine searches, proceed to interview stage.
wow_factor: Utilizing advanced natural language processing to provide relevant candidates based on intuitive queries.
expected_output: A streamlined workflow with a chat interface for efficient candidate filtering.
